mapper.update: UPDATE CLASSTABLE SET CLASSNAMENUMBER=#{classNameNumber},CLASSNAMECHI=#{classNameChi}, INMAJOR=#{inMajor} WHERE CLASSID=#{classId};
mapper.delete: UPDATE CLASSTABLE SET ISDELETED='1' WHERE CLASSID=#{classId}
mapper.select: SELECT A1.CLASSID,A1.CLASSNAMENUMBER,A1.CLASSNAMECHI,A1.INMAJOR,A1.ISDELETED, A2.MAJORNAME AS 'majorName',A2.MAJORNUMBER AS 'majorNumber' FROM CLASSTABLE A1,MAJORTABLE A2 WHERE A1.INMAJOR=A2.MAJORID AND A1.CLASSID=#{classId} AND A1.ISDELETED=0
SELECT CLASSID,CLASSNAMENUMBER,CLASSNAMECHI,INMAJOR,ISDELETED FROM CLASSTABLE WHERE INMAJOR=#{majorId} AND ISDELETED=0

SELECT A1.CLASSID,A1.CLASSNAMENUMBER,A1.CLASSNAMECHI,A1.INMAJOR,A1.ISDELETED, A2.MAJORNAME AS 'majorName',A2.MAJORNUMBER AS 'majorNumber' FROM CLASSTABLE A1,MAJORTABLE A2 WHERE A1.INMAJOR=A2.MAJORID AND A1.ISDELETED=0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASSTABLE A1,MAJORTABLE A2 WHERE A1.INMAJOR=A2.MAJORID AND A1.ISDELETED=0
SELECT CLASSID FROM CLASSTABLE WHERE ISDELETED=0 AND CLASSNAMENUMBER LIKE #{classNumber}
SELECT CLASSID FROM CLASSTABLE WHERE ISDELETED=0 AND CLASSNAMECHI LIKE #{className}
